content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All employees, officers and Board members are expected to know and follow EPAM Code of Conduct. EPAM also expects all contractors, suppliers and other business partners to follow this Code when working for or with us. Failure to follow the Code can result in disciplinary action or termination of the relationship. Disciplinary action may also be taken against managers or officers who condone, permit or fail to take appropriate preventative, corrective or other action against illegal, unethical or other improper conduct. If you become aware of conduct that you think violates the EPAM Code, or that is or may be harmful to EPAM, you should let EPAM know.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please, use the link \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/policy/uk/london/epam-code-of-conduct.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Code of Conduct\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to read further.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
